description: This file is a PHP script responsible for rendering the web page displaying Wi-Fi status and information in a gateway device's web interface. It includes configuration and status retrieval for dual-band Wi-Fi radios, along with HTML markup for presenting the data to the user.

methods.name: div_mod
methods.description: Calculates the quotient and remainder when dividing two numbers, used for converting seconds into days/hours/minutes/seconds.
